text: The Spain women's national under-18 and under-19 is a national basketball team of Spain and is governed by the Spanish Basketball Federation. http://www.fiba.com/pages/eng/fc/FIBA/fibaStru/nfLeag/p/nationalfederationnumber/2612/nfProf.html It represents Spain in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. ==Tournament record== ===World Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="50"| !!
